title: Update the legal files
body:
Updated the legal files:
 - The `ThirdPartyNotices` file already exists: `External-Dependency-Info.txt`
 - The `LICENSE` file that was added is just for docs, so I moved it to the docs folder: `docs/LICENSE.txt`
 - Removed the `LICENSE-CODE` file as this is a code repo and the code license is more important than the docs. Also, the license was incorrect as we are Xamarin and Microsoft licenses, not Apache

@mikekinsman and @redth, could you review this?

comments.author: mikekinsman
comments.body:
